front.title: BFD for Multipoint Networks over Point-to-Multi-Point MPLS LSP

abstract.t: This document describes procedures for using Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) for multipoint networks to detect data plane failures in Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) point-to-multipoint (p2mp) Label Switched Paths (LSPs). It also describes applicability of out- band solutions to bootstrap a BFD session in this environment.
